query:
ALTER TABLE `alert_templates` 
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS `email_subject` varchar(255),
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS `email_body` text,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS `email_html` text,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS `whatsapp_message` text,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS `push_title` varchar(100),
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS `push_body` text,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS `is_system` boolean NOT NULL DEFAULT false,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS `updated_at` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
MODIFY COLUMN `type` enum('anomaly', 'prediction', 'error', 'performance', 'custom') NOT NULL;

ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS `email_body` text,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS `email_html` text,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS `whatsapp_message` text,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS `push_title` varchar(100),
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS `push_body` text,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS `is_system` boolean NOT NULL DEFAULT false,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS `updated_at` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
MODIFY COLUMN `type` enum('anomaly', 'prediction', 'error', 'performance', 'custom') NOT NULL;
